title: Loop-mediated isothermal amplification assay detects multiple alleles of blaOXA-51-like genes in Acinetobacter baumannii and other Gram-negative bacteria despite primer-template mismatches
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Mark B. Carascal, Lawrence S. Macalalad, Joy Ann Petronio-Santos, Raul V. Destura, Windell L. Rivera
